synopsis: Strange Tales of China discusses extremely frightening situations when mulled over carefully. What would happen if they were really to occur in real life? The mischievous imaginative Xiaozhi, born with a spiritual physique, possesses a strong sixth sense, high IQ and immense curiosity... but these are his greatest weaknesses as well. Each and every time, he finds some fancy new way to seek death thanks to his morbid curiosity.
